sentences.sContent: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.sCn: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.sContent: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.sCn: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.sContent: We had plenty to eat and drink.
It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.sCn: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.sContent: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.sCn: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.sContent: Would you like something to eat?
She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.sCn: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.sContent: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.sCn: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.sContent: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.sCn: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.sContent: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.sCn: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.sContent: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.sCn: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

phrases.pCn: 健康首选；吃得营养；吃的好；胃口好
上馆子吃饭；锈坏；使腐烂
丢脸；被迫收回自己说的话
即食食品；速煮食品；方便食品
侵蚀；痛快地吃，尽情地吃

words.tran: 侵蚀的；可生食的；进餐用的

trans.tranOther: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
